title: on migrate file contract method can't correctly called
body:
- [ ] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue

I create a private geth network on my server. In my migrate file, I call a method to set data after deploy a contract. But exec truffle migrate to my own remote private network, the method can't correctly called.
Then i exec truffle migrate to kovan test network, the method correctly called.

## Steps to Reproduce

1.  migrate file partial fragment
```javascript
deployer.deploy(EncoderUtil, { from: PlatformAccount })
            .then(() => {
                return deployer.link(EncoderUtil, ServiceStorage);
            })
            .then(() => {
                return deployer.deploy(ServiceStorage, {
                    from: PlatformAccount
                });
            })
            .then(() => {
                return ServiceStorage.deployed();
            })
            .then(_ins => {
                ins = _ins;
                ins.set('demo', EncoderUtil.address, {
                    from: PlatformAccount
                }).then(rel => {
                    console.log(rel);
                });
            });
```

2. truffle migrate to own private network( set method can't correctly called)

```
Replacing 'EncoderUtil'
   -----------------------
   > transaction hash:    0xd1e7492a7e64d0adf04e5c54fee73d2b50f93b9028396e9d6b655d3dd9fbcf40
   > Blocks: 0            Seconds: 12
   > contract address:    0x707861Fef115EC8a6D05b5F11EFd33D502c0cF40
   > account:             0x8CD6Bc1a9C695365bdAa42fA689Ea025b271BF67
   > balance:             21015
   > gas used:            232214
   > gas price:           20 gwei
   > value sent:          0 ETH
   > total cost:          0.00464428 ETH


   Linking
   -------
   * Contract: ServiceStorage <--> Library: EncoderUtil (at address: 0x707861Fef115EC8a6D05b5F11EFd33D502c0cF40)

   Replacing 'ServiceStorage'
   --------------------------
   > transaction hash:    0x37203968385e79bbe00ff85bf73b3a654fb329da28e918fe3ba5a83393998663
   > Blocks: 0            Seconds: 4
   > contract address:    0x9e5a04b47Bf6E8Ac849880aa41d56A4372096856
   > account:             0x8CD6Bc1a9C695365bdAa42fA689Ea025b271BF67
   > balance:             21020
   > gas used:            646296
   > gas price:           20 gwei
   > value sent:          0 ETH
   > total cost:          0.01292592 ETH


   ⠏ Saving migration to chain.{ tx: '0x5109ab07c0bcb7a2199da3cb111136185426cb1e0385234e525a047ca60d5abe',
  receipt: 
   { blockHash: '0x4388ac7b58d7b3fe8cb66bfc33dd442fa4dc29632657421af58f762bc4c08fdd',
     blockNumber: 4211,
     contractAddress: null,
     cumulativeGasUsed: 6721975,
     from: '0x8cd6bc1a9c695365bdaa42fa689ea025b271bf67',
     gasUsed: 6721975,
     logs: [],
     logsBloom: '',
     root: '0xa580029bb788d77b657efcd611e648898997fc6e237f81202e19565085a1a5fd',
     to: '0x9e5a04b47bf6e8ac849880aa41d56a4372096856',
     transactionHash: '0x5109ab07c0bcb7a2199da3cb111136185426cb1e0385234e525a047ca60d5abe',
     transactionIndex: 0,
     rawLogs: [] },
  logs: [] }
   > Saving migration to chain.
   > Saving artifacts
   -------------------------------------

```


3. truffle migrate to kovan network(set method correctly called)

```

   Linking

   Replacing 'ServiceStorage'

   ⠦ Saving migration to chain.{ tx: '0xf02b68060421298f3317b3f28cb61248f7f77ed8f87b96f25edf95e73bd3ac84',

     blockNumber: 10102036,
     contractAddress: null,

     logs: [ [Object] ],

     root: null,

       blockHash: '0xb47058cb4b923791546ae055d8874411492441e586ac67e83cd8df19d6eaa995',
       blockNumber: 10102036,
       logIndex: 0,
       removed: false,
       transactionHash: '0xf02b68060421298f3317b3f28cb61248f7f77ed8f87b96f25edf95e73bd3ac84',
       transactionIndex: 0,
       transactionLogIndex: '0x0',
       type: 'mined',
       id: 'log_ecd256a8',
       event: 'LogServiceStorageUpdate',
       args: [Object] } ] }
   > Saving migration to chain.
   > Saving artifacts
   -------------------------------------
   > Total cost:           0.0175702 ETH
```

## Expected Behavior

On migrate phase，the set method  correctly called.

## Environment

* Server Operating System: 
```
LSB Version:    core-9.20160110ubuntu0.2-amd64:core-9.20160110ubuntu0.2-noarch:security-9.20160110ubuntu0.2-amd64:security-9.20160110ubuntu0.2-noarch
Distributor ID: Ubuntu
Description:    Ubuntu 16.04.4 LTS
Release:        16.04
Codename:       xenial
```
* Ethereum client:
```
Geth
Version: 1.8.21-stable
Git Commit: 9dc5d1a915ac0e0bd8429d6ac41df50eec91de5f
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.10.4
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=/usr/lib/go-1.10
```
* Truffle version (`truffle version`):
```
Truffle v5.0.0 (core: 5.0.0)
Solidity - 0.5.1 (solc-js)
Node v8.14.0
```
* node version (`node --version`):
```
v8.14.0
```
* npm version (`npm --version`): 
```
6.5.0
```
Could you give us the commands you run to start your geth private network? Thanks!
Hi @zhidongluo , is this still an issue on the latest version of truffle?
Closing this for issue maintenance. Let us know if this is still an issue and we'll happily reopen. Cheers!
